ygData.messageBody:
just bought summon throwing daggers. and yes we can use them..
You have put them in range weapon. What fun this is.. try it
sometime.. i think this will be a blast to have my pet tanking and me
throwing daggers at it.. Again no big damage but sure is fun
watching the dagger fight at the beasties..


From: Wizard <wizard@...>

1. giant snake fang - - - found on asps and other giant snakes wich are
found an all continents an some its realy hard to find a place where
snakes live ( hint for elves and gnomes "zone with a lake and isle in
middle high risk 20 lv mob around") nice for starting players price go
from 5 gold to 1 pl

2. crook sting ----- excelent weapon fond on giant wasp magic poison

3. bixie sting is excelent MAGIC 1 dmg weapon it can be used very very
well by..... MEDIUM SPOILER









low lv PETS to get magic attack and hit that elementals and skeletons and
wisps and some other things
